Statute.Title: Crown Corporations Dissolution or Transfer Authorization Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Dissolution ou la cession de sociétés d’État, Loi sur la)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1991, c. 38 in force on assent 26.11.91 except ss. 2(2) and (3), 5 and 6 which are in force 17.03.93 see SI/93-46; s. 9 in force 04.02.93 see SI/93-18; ss. 10(1) and (2) and 11 to 32 in force 26.11.91 see SI/91‑161; ss. 35 to 39 in force 01.08.93 see SI/93-153; s. 42 in force 31.03.2006 see SI/2006-58; s. 46 in force 30.04.92 see SI/92‑77; ss. 4, 8, 33(2), 43 and 44 repealed before coming into force 31.12.2011 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3
CIF, 1994, c. 24, s. 34 in force on assent 23.06.94
